Title: The Grand Debut
Description:
The Proscenium is looking amazing! Are you ready to get on stage?

Give us a hand as part of the crew, and we'll give you a chance to act.

Will you accept this directive?
ObjectivesText: Complete one Theater Troupe event in The Proscenium.
CompletionText: I haven't seen you on stage yet, $n. You won't win any fans by standing around!
RewardText:
What a good show! I think your work on the Proscenium has made this an excellent stage.

Come by again sometime. We always need hands for the cast and crew!
